app.Click here to report an inappropriate ad: Click here to report an inappropriate ad.
app.Click the Language menu: Click the Language menu in the upper right to switch to English
app.Free and easy to use: Free and easy to use. Used by teachers and for raffles. Enter names and spin the wheel to pick a random winner. Customize look and feel, save and share wheels.
app.We try to display only legitimate and ho: We try to display only legitimate and honest ads.
app.authError:
That didn't work. Please try again and you will be prompted to sign in. If it still doesn't work, try these things: refresh the page with Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows, Linux, Chromebook) or Command+Shift+R (Mac), turn off your ad-blocker, turn off your anti-virus software.

({error})

appInfo.The entries you make: The entries you make above will be displayed on the wheel. When you click the wheel, it spins and picks a random winner. You can customize the appearance and behavior of the wheel, and save and share wheels with others.
appInfo.Did you know: Did you know that you can change the color, sound, and behavior of the wheel by clicking Customize at the top of this page?
appInfo.The names you enter: The names you enter above will be displayed on the wheel. When you click the wheel, it spins and picks a random winner. You can customize the appearance and behavior of the wheel, and save and share wheels with others.
appInfo.When I was a boy: "When I was a boy and I would see scary things in the news, my mother would say to me, 'Look for the helpers. You will always find people who are helping.' ‚Äù

opendialog.Are you sure: Are you sure you want to delete {wheelTitle}? This action cannot be undone.
opendialog.No wheels found: No wheels found in your account. Try saving a wheel!
opendialog.To open wheels: To open wheels you need to sign in to an account. Please choose your sign-in method below.

optionsdialog.All names in the text-box: All names in the text-box have the same chance of winning, regardless of this value.
optionsdialog.Image in the center of the wheel: Image in the center of the wheel
optionsdialog.Max names on wheel: Max number of names visible on the wheel
optionsdialog.Play click sound when the winner is remo: Play a click sound when the winner is removed
optionsdialog.Your image has been uploaded: Your image {fileName} has been uploaded successfully. Would you like to use the prominent colors from this image for the sectors of your wheel?

profiledropdown.Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Are you sure you want to delete your account and all your saved wheels? This action cannot be undone.
profiledropdown.Your account and your saved wheels have: Your account and your saved wheels have been deleted

savedialog.Sorry, too many images: Sorry, this wheel has too many images to be saved in the database. Reduce the number of images and try saving again.
savedialog.To save wheels: To save wheels you need to sign in to an account. Please choose your sign-in method below.

sharedialog.If you continue: If you continue, you will create a public link to your current wheel, including its names, colors and settings.
sharedialog.Link to this wheel: Link to this wheel with current names, colors and settings:
sharedialog.Sorry, too many images: Sorry, this wheel has too many images to be shared. Reduce the number of images and try saving again.
sharedialog.They should be able to spin the wheel an: They should be able to spin the wheel and edit their own copy of the wheel
sharedialog.They should only be able to spin the whe: They should only be able to spin the wheel
sharedialog.This link will work for anyone: This link will work for anyone and you can share it by email, website, social media, etc.
sharedialog.We want this website to be safe place fo: We want this website to be a safe place for everyone. Wheels that aren't family-friendly and that violate the terms of service will be deleted.
sharedialog.What should a person be able to do: What should a person be able to do when they use your shared link?

sheetdialog.Is a header and should not be imported: Is a header and should not be imported
sheetdialog.To import sheets: To import sheets you need to log in to your Google account. Why? Google needs to know who you are, so they can let you pick one of your spreadsheets.
sheetdialog.When you link a spreadsheet: When you link a spreadsheet, the wheel will contain the same entries as the spreadsheet. If rows are added or deleted in the spreadsheet, entries are automatically added to or removed from the wheel. The connection will close after one hour.

toolbar.Please enter your email address: Please enter your email address to continue
toolbar.Your session is now being recorded: Your session is now being recorded. You can stop the recording by closing your browser window.

twitterdialog.Found Twitter users: Found {userCount} Twitter users who have tweeted about "{term}" recently
twitterdialog.This search will fetch:
This search will fetch the users who have posted recently on Twitter.

If you want these users... ...enter this search query
Users who recently tweeted using the tag #abc #abc
Users who recently posted a tweet containing the text "kittens" kittens
Users who recently retweeted tweets from @nytopinion @nytopinion filter:nativeretweets
Users who recently retweeted tweets from @nytopinion that contain the text "1619" @nytopinion filter:nativeretweets 1619

The most recent 600 tweets are considered and no tweet older than 24 hours is included. Twitter user names will start with "@".
